document_data.name: Lhemako Taraskh
document_data.mainbody: '''Lhemako Taraskh'''<ref group="note">[[The Magister (sourcebook)|The Magister]] lists his name as "Lhemako Tarsakh". was a caravan master of the [[Zhentarim]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], who served under the Head of Caravans, [[Meer]].
document_data.History:
At some point, Lhemako recovered the lost [[scimitar]] ''[[Shazzellim]]'' and had it identified by the [[sage]] of [[Hillsfar]], [[Helavaster]]. He then proceeded to bestow it upon his superior, Meer. 

Lhemako was believed to have died in [[1368 DR]], during the destruction of [[Zhentil Keep]] by the [[Cyric]]ist army comprised of [[giant]]s and [[white dragon]]s.
